#summary TF2 Competitive Configuration Project Overview

= Intent =
This project's intent is to provide a comprehensive configuration for Team Fortress 2 competitive play. It attempts to provide convenience rather than advantage and aims to be league legal.

= How to Use =

   Everything is either automatic or optional.

= Featured HUD(s) =
_If you would like your HUD included in the project, upload it!_ This project was started so people could easily share their configurations.

= How to Install =
Download the latest package from the _downloads_ section and run the exe (requires .net 3.5). Alternately, you may manually install the files you would like to make use of that are archived in the package.
